Package net.myorb.math.expressions.charting

Implementations of the charting interface that provide a default charting solution.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DisplayGraphLibraryInterface
    graphics library interface
    MouseSampleTrigger.SampleDisplay
    the interface used by the display layer
    MultiFunctionPlot.FunctionPlot
    describe the function to plot
    MultiFunctionPlot.PlotDescriptors
    describe all of the element of the chart
    PlotComputers.RealizationTracking
    breakdown plot computation processing
    PlotComputers.TransformProcessing
    cause results generation by transform
    PlotComputers.TransformResultsCollection
    describe results of 3D transform
    Transform2D.Domain
    describe a domain
    Transform2D.Transform
    describe a 2D to 2D transform
    TransformPolar.ComplexTransform
    describe a function with complex domain and range
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComplexPlaneTransform
    implementation of polar plot functionality
    ContourPlotProperties
    collect properties required to construct contour plot
    DisplayGraph
    chart drawing primitives
    DisplayGraph3D
    generic 3D plotting engine.
    DisplayGraphAtomic
    provide low-level properties and methods for supporting plots, graphs, and charts
    DisplayGraphPrimitives
    implementation of graphics interface making DisplayGraph class the default behavior
    ExpressionGraphing<T>
    implementation of the graph command
    HighDefinitionPlots<T>
    plot preparation for 3D mesh/membrane/contour type plots
    MouseEventHandler
    support a zoom plot functionality
    MouseMotionHandler
    translate mouse events into tool tips on the chart
    MouseSampleTrigger<T>
    a mouse listener that will trigger a legend display update
    MultiDimensionalVectored<T>
    implementation of multi-dimensional transform realization
    MultiFunctionPlot
    describe a chart plotting multiple functions
    OffAxisHandler
    perform coordinate translations for mouse events
    Plot3D<T>
    boiler plate for 3D plot control
    Plot3DContour<T>
    3D plot control for contour style plots
    Plot3DMesh<T>
    special case for mesh/membrane type plots
    PlotComputers
    algorithms for collecting plot points
    RegressionCharts<T>
    methods for building charts of regression operations
    Tracking
    compile table of contour plots
    Tracking.DescriptorMap  
    Tracking.PlotMap  
    Transform2D
    map 2 dimensional plane to 2 dimensional plane
    TransformPolar
    provide polar coordinate transformation for complex mapping

Package net.myorb.math.expressions.charting Description

Implementations of the charting interface that provide a default charting solution.
